mapr.master

Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapr.master.FileInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Encapsulates all metadata (excluding name) of a file on DFS, including its replica locations, partitioning rules, etc.
    Author:
    Derek Tzeng
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      FileInfo(int numPartitions, int numRecords)
      Initializes a FileInfo with certain number of partitions (chunks) and records (lines).

      • addReplicaLocation

        public void addReplicaLocation(int partition,
                      java.lang.String worker)
        Adds to the record that some specific worker contains a certain parition of file.
        Parameters:
        partition - Parition ID that the Worker contains.
        worker - Name of the Worker node in concern.

      • removeReplicaLocation

                         java.lang.String worker)
        Remove from the record that some specific worker contains a certain parition of file.
        Parameters:
        partition - Parition ID that the Worker no longer contains.
        workerName - of the Worker node in concern.
